item.title: Sharp rise in airfare and food costs pushed UK inflation higher in July, denting rate cut hopes
item.description: Higher food and airfare prices pushed U.K. inflation above expectations in July

item.title: Global shares are mixed, while Labubu maker Pop Mart soars 12.5% in Hong Kong
item.description: Global shares are mostly lower, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other artificial-intelligence stars

item.title: California man who shipped weapons to North Korea is sentenced to 8 years in prison
item.description: A California man has been sentenced to eight years in prison after admitting to shipping weapons and ammunition to North Korea

item.title: Does Paris have too many tourists? A European crisis comes to Montmartre
item.description: The cobbled streets of Paris' once-bohemian Montmartre district are becoming the latest flashpoint in European cities' pushback against overtourism

item.title: Newspapers are rescued from closure in Wyoming and South Dakota as buyers swoop in
item.description: A dozen newspapers in Wyoming and South Dakota are set to publish again after buyers stepped in to keep the communities from becoming news deserts whe...
